from urllib import request;from zipfile import ZipFile;from io import BytesIO;from os import environ
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HeydoubleU/BPM/main/client/BPM_client.zip'
ZipFile(BytesIO(request.urlopen(url).read())).extractall(path=environ["MAYA_APP_DIR"]+'/scripts/BPM')
import BPM
BPM.start(True)
